name: DARK LIGHT (itch) (Feezen, Rendyl, Benoit Deneaux)
description:
Life is a mixture of light and shadow..

GTMK Game Jam 40 , Theme : Joined Together

Opposites come together and complete.

Light and shadow are opposite sides of the same coin.
We can illuminate our paths or darken our way.. It is a matter of choice.
Use your light wisely and venture through the dungeon.

Beware ! Don't lose yourself !

Controls :

> WASD / ZQSD : Movement
> TAB / E : Switch Character (when Link is ON)
> R : Restart from Checkpoint

Made by : 
  • Benoit Deneaux : Audio - Code - Shaders
  • Rendy : Art - Code
  • Tanguy Laloix : Code
  • Laeticce : Props
